title: Program for Enhancing Mathematical Problem-Solving Competencies in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical computational skills and job-related fundamental problem-solving experience
context.additional_context: Blended learning environment using smartphone-based tools, emphasizing practical application via project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems with over 80% accuracy using digital/offline materials provided in a blended learning environment
Learners can create weekly study plans and apply three or more learning strategies (deep/strategic approaches) appropriately to different situations
Learners analyze mathematical problems occurring in actual job situations through team project execution and prepare/report on them

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
